Text.Page: At Chione's request, you fought Acharak and his minions and recovered a simple-looking feather that practically burned with arcane energy.

My airship went down because of these orcans. The worst of them, though, is {@linkcreature:13#1002#Acharak}.

He took over the entire Tainted Gorge Garrison! I think he has a powerful talisman.

Kill him and take it, then bring it to Edan. He'll know what we can do with it.

This token is so small, so simple, yet it hurts just to hold it. Such power!

This is no orcan talisman. Someone imbued this with tremendous magic.

Well done, . Thank you.
